article: When Mary Smith was a  _  , she wanted to be a teacher,  _  she liked children. When she was twenty, she began teaching in a small school. She was a good teacher, and she  _  a lot with the children in her class. They  _  her teaching. One day  _  of the girls in her class said to her, "Miss Smith,  _  does a man's hair become grey before his beard does?" Mary laughed and answered, "I don't know. Helen, do you know?" "I  don't know  , either, Miss Smith," said Helen, "but it happened to my father." The  _  children in the class laughed when they heard this. Then a boy said, "I  _  , Miss Smith. A man's hair becomes grey  _  because it's sixteen years older than his beard."
